screenshot.caption: OVPN file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: OpenVPN contains a set of sample configuration files, stored in its sample-config-files directory. In Windows, you can also access these sample configurations by opening the Windows Start menu and then selecting OpenVPN → OpenVPN Sample Configuration Files . The sample configuration files are named server.ovpn and client.ovpn .
You should store any custom OVPN files that you create in the Program Files/​OpenVPN/​config directory.
NOTE: On Unix systems, OVPN files use the .conf extension instead of the .ovpn extension.
